SysTableOrgConds.text:
SELECT t.primarykey AS entityid,
    ua.username AS userid,
    ua.applicationcode
   FROM translations t,  userapplications ua

/*AND NGV_ENT.SYSTEMFLAG = 'Y'
UNION
AND
NGV_ENTDICT.COLNAME IN
(SELECT CNAME FROM NGV_COL WHERE TNAME = NGV_ENT.TNAME
AND STRCAT(NGV_COL.ISID,NGV_COL.ISIDA) LIKE '%Y%')
UNION
AND (
NGV_ENTDICT.COLNAME IN ('===','__NEWENTPAGE__')
OR NGV_ENT.ENTTYPE NOT IN ('P', 'L')
OR STRCAT(NGV_PAGEITEMS.TOSHOW, NGV_LISTITEMS.TOSHOW,
NGV_PAGEITEMSA.TOSHOW, NGV_LISTITEMSA.TOSHOW) LIKE '%Y%'
OR NGV_LISTITEMS.SORT + NGV_LISTITEMSA.SORT > 0
OR NGV_ENTDICT.COLNAME LIKE 'Message%'
)
AND NGV_ENTDICT.ENTNAME IN
(SELECT NGV_CMDENTITIES.ENTNAME FROM NGV_CMDENTITIES, NGV_APPS
WHERE NGV_APPS.APPNAME = :NGV_APPNAME
AND NGV_APPS.MENUCMD = NGV_CMDENTITIES.CMDNAME)
UNION
AND NGV_ENT.SONENTNAME IN
(SELECT NGV_CMDENTITIES.ENTNAME FROM NGV_CMDENTITIES, NGV_APPS
WHERE NGV_APPS.APPNAME = :NGV_APPNAME
AND NGV_APPS.MENUCMD = NGV_CMDENTITIES.CMDNAME)
AND NGV_ENT.ENTTYPE = 'C'
AND NGV_ENTDICT.COLNAME = '==='
UNION
AND NGV_ENT.CMDTYPE  IN (SELECT CMDTYPE FROM NGV_CMDTYPES A
WHERE SYNC_TRANSLATIONS = 'Y')
UNION
AND EXISTS
(SELECT 'X' FROM NGV_ENTA WHERE ENTNAME = NGV_ENT.ENTNAME
AND CMDTYPE IN (SELECT CMDTYPE FROM NGV_CMDTYPES A
WHERE SYNC_TRANSLATIONS = 'Y'))
UNION
AND NGV_ENT.NEXTCMD IN
(SELECT NGV_CMDENTITIES.ENTNAME FROM NGV_CMDENTITIES, NGV_APPS
WHERE NGV_APPS.APPNAME = :NGV_APPNAME
AND NGV_APPS.MENUCMD = NGV_CMDENTITIES.CMDNAME)
AND NGV_ENT.ENTTYPE = 'C'
UNION
AND EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM NGV_ENT EX WHERE EX.ENTNAME =
NGV_ENT.NEXTCMD  AND CMDTYPE IN (SELECT CMDTYPE FROM NGV_CMDTYPES A
WHERE NEXT_COMMANDS = 'Y'))
AND NGV_ENT.ENTTYPE = 'C'
UNION
AND NGV_ENT.ENTNAME IN
(SELECT EX.SONENTNAME FROM NGV_CMDENTITIES, NGV_APPS , NGV_ENT EX
WHERE NGV_APPS.APPNAME = :NGV_APPNAME
AND NGV_APPS.MENUCMD = NGV_CMDENTITIES.CMDNAME
AND EX.ENTNAME = NGV_CMDENTITIES.ENTNAME)
UNION
AND EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM NGV_ENTA EXA, NGV_CMDENTITIES, NGV_APPS
WHERE EXA.NEXTCMD = NGV_CMDENTITIES.ENTNAME
AND EXA.ENTNAME = NGV_ENT.ENTNAME
AND NGV_APPS.MENUCMD = NGV_CMDENTITIES.CMDNAME
AND NGV_APPS.APPNAME =  :NGV_APPNAME)
AND NGV_ENT.ENTTYPE = 'C'
UNION
AND EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM NGV_ENTA NA, NGV_ENTA EX WHERE
NA.ENTNAME = NGV_ENT.ENTNAME
AND EX.ENTNAME = NA.NEXTCMD
AND EX.CMDTYPE  IN (SELECT CMDTYPE FROM NGV_CMDTYPES A
WHERE NEXT_COMMANDS = 'Y')
)
*/
